PAD_BrinePool.synopsis: A PAD reacting to the brine pool in the Tadpoling Centre in the Colony. The player will interact with the brine pool and play this dialog. If a player succeeds a perception check and fishes out the last remaining tadpole, a different node will be played.
PAD_BrinePool.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the brine pools at the back of the Colony Tadpoling Centre: "oe tc_brine" or "goto 687 18 41"- Interact with the brine pool on the left-hand side. Or fail the perception check on the right-hand pool.

PAD_BrinePool_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BrinePool_0.text: No tadpoles in this brine pool.

PAD_BrinePool_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BrinePool_1.text: No more tadpoles in here. Wonder what happened to them?
